summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2383, for the improvement of 45th Avenue Southwest, from West Edmunds Street to West Hanford Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 24843 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
